## Workspace

A [Visual Studio Code](vscode.md) workspace is the collection of one or more
folders that are opened in a VS Code window (instance). to setup and configure a
workspace, a `.code-workspace` is required.

- [What is a VS Code "workspace"?](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/workspaces)
